title: Store and loot
body: Do I not get my loot from a chest while the store is down?

replies.body: Store is up now, can you hop into your loot and let me know if anything's missing? o.o

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=b3JOL15A,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-12-01T05:59:48.024+0000)
>
> Store is up now, can you hop into your loot and let me know if anything's missing? o.o

Everything is fixed, Thanks!
